short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make HTTP requests from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fetch Fast is a lightweight, super-fast alternative to Postman for making HTTP requests directly from your browser.

Make HTTP requests directly from your browser with ease using Fetch Fast! This powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension is designed for developers, testers, and anyone who needs to interact with APIs or web services without leaving their browser.

Key Features:

Simple Interface: A clean, intuitive UI makes it easy to send requests and view responses.
Supports Various HTTP Methods: Whether it's GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, or others, Fetch Fast handles them all.
Customizable Headers and Body: Easily modify request headers and body to suit your testing needs.
Response Display: View status codes and response content directly in the extension.
JSON Support: Perfect for dealing with JSON data, with pretty print format for easy reading.
Whether you're testing APIs, debugging, or simply exploring web services, Fetch Fast is your go-to tool for making HTTP requests on-the-fly. Get started now and enhance your web development and testing workflow!
